author: Emily Muscutt
description: A wonderfully delicate and dry aperitif. Genever provides a bready spirituous base over which flavours of gentian, fennel and absinthe are layered.
name: Time for Suze
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass
